text:
BlackSMS | Senior Software Engineer | Palo Alto | ONSITE | VISA

We're building the future of inter-organization communication. @ BlackSMS you'll be thrust in as our 4th engineering hire to collaborate on a secure and easy to use messenger and calendar service. We're primarily based on Node.JS, ElasticSearch, Firebase, React, React-Native and Swift/iOS.

--

Apply at (https://black-sms.breezy.hr/) or send me your resume to my email: shub[at]blacksms.net
